name: You?
description:
!! The game is mobile friendly, but it's still have some bug. So, you can play with mobile device but not as good as playing on PC !!

Left-click to the Object if u're using Pc
Also, u can do touch if u're using Phone (but maybe u must hold it for a while)

This Game is Made for Joining  The GameFlip - Game Jam

A fast-paced game of visual memory and quick reflexes! In this game, you are presented with a grid of different faces, and your objective is to find the one face that has no twin among the others.

As soon as you spot the unique face, quickly click on it to progress to the next level. Each level presents a new set of faces, and the difficulty increases as you advance through the game. But be warned, you only start with 60 seconds timer to find as many unique faces as possible.

For each correct answer, you gain 2 points and 2 second times, but if you make a mistake, 2 seconds will be deducted from the remaining time. The challenge is to find as many unique faces as you can and earn the highest score possible before the timer runs out.

"You?" is the perfect game for those who enjoy testing their visual memory and reaction time. With vibrant graphics and challenging gameplay, you'll find yourself playing this addictive game(hope so)  over and over again. So, sharpen your eyes, focus your mind, and get ready to hunt for some face!

Credit
